attackable

Class Robot<T extends Useable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • positionable.Positionable
      • attackable.Attackable
        • attackable.Robot<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - generic type which can be any class that implements the Usable interface.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Fighter, Worker

    public abstract class Robot<T extends Useable>
extends Attackable
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
    Abstract class that describes a generic robot . Characterized by a name , an energy, a force , a health and belonging to a team.
    Author:
    Mattia Rosselli
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Robot(java.lang.String name)
      Constructor that takes as explicit parameter a name and Creates a robot with that name and the rest of the default parameters .
